FuncDef: This command specifies the in-profile LSP EXP value for the forwarding class. The EXP value will be used for all LSP labeled packets requiring marking that require marking at egress on this forwarding class queue, and that are in-profile. The inplus-profile traffic is marked with the same value as in-profile traffic.

ParaDef.Info: The 3-bit LSP EXP bit value, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-0 to 7.

ExtraInfo:
Default: Policy-id 1:Factory setting
Policy-id 2 to 65535:Policy-id setting
